front.title: MPLS Data Plane Encapsulation for In-situ OAM Data

abstract.t: In-situ Operations, Administration, and Maintenance (IOAM) is used for recording and collecting operational and telemetry information while the packet traverses a path between two points in the network. This document defines how IOAM data fields are transported with MPLS data plane encapsulation using MPLS Network Action (MNA) with new Generic Associated Channel (G-ACh) and updates the RFC 5586.
